title: Multiply and Add Function
description:
MUL_ADD multiplies the input value X with K and adds O.
MUL_ADD = X * K + O.
MUL_ADD (0.5, 10, 2) is 0.5 * 10 + 2 = 7
name: MUL_ADD

input.name: X
input.description: The first input value that will be multiplied.

input.name: K
input.description: The second input value that will multiply with X.

input.name: O
input.description: The value that will be added to the product of X and K.

return_value.description: The result of the operation, which is the value of X multiplied by K, plus O.
